Reviews.Title: NEX-7
Reviews.Author: Edward C. Ferraro
Reviews.Content: What a great product!  One of the best digital cameras on the market… easy to use, with outstanding performance… the lens are fantastic - I love the speed of the 50mm f/1.8

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Alpha NEX-7 Digital Camera Body (Black) + <2> Sony NEX E 55-210mm Lens + <3> Sony NEX E 50mm f/1.8 Lens +
